title: What are books that merge Western and Eastern philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bernardo Kastrup has written a few: Metaphysical Speculations  Also to the degree, that science can be thought of as the primary product of Western philosophy than the classic text The Tao of Physics would be another such book. Also, one could argue the physical theories of David Bohm and the psychological theories of Carl Jung merge Western and Eastern philosophy in their work.

The works under the name of Alice A. Bailey, most of which were actually by her teacher, merge Western and Eastern philosophy. Collectively, they are about the size of a set of encyclopedias and are all available to read and search online: Alice Baily: Online Books (Lucis Trust) This Google search of the publisher’s site will give you an impression of the nature of the merge: East West philosophy
